name: SELENA Belly Story (Old version)
description: Selena, a daughter of one of the most famous models in the world, discovers that she has the power to return to her normal weight after overeating while sleeping. This makes her happy and she manages to turn it into a fad over time. Play with Selena in a whole city, where food and bellies abound and discover her history from her adolescence to her adulthood.
